broadwick.math

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.math.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends Object
    Implementation of real valued Matrix.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Matrix

        private Matrix(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.Array2DRowRealMatrix data)
        Create a matrix from the internal representation of the matrix (copy construtor). This constructor is intentionally private to hide the internal representation of the matrix.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to be copied.

      • Matrix

        private Matrix(double[][] data)
        Create a matrix using the data in an array (copy constructor). This constructor will copy the contents of the argument.
        Parameters:
        data - the data array to be copied.

      • Matrix

        public Matrix(int rowDimension,
              int columnDimension)
        Create a matrix with the given dimensions.
        Parameters:
        rowDimension - the number of rows in the matrix.
        columnDimension - the number of columns in the matrix.

    • Method Detail

      • element

        public double element(int row,
                      int column)
        Get the contents of the matrix. The (i,j) element of the matrix is returned where i is the row index and j is the column index.
        Parameters:
        row - the row index.
        column - the column index.
        Returns:
        the entry at eh requiered index.

      • setEntry

        public double setEntry(int row,
                       int column,
                       double value)
        Set the matrix element at a given point.
        Parameters:
        row - the row index of the new element.
        column - the column element of the new element.
        value - the value to be set.
        Returns:
        the new matrix element at the given coordinates.

      • toArray

        public double[][] toArray()
        Return an array representation of this matrix.
        Returns:
        a double[][] containing the values of this matrix.

      • copy

        public Matrix copy()
        Create a copy of the matrix. A new matrix is returned with the same contents of this one.
        Returns:
        a copy of this matrix.

      • inverse

        public Matrix inverse()
        Get the inverse of the matrix. This will return a new matrix object that is the inverse.
        Returns:
        a Matrix object that is the inverse of this matrix.

      • transpose

        public Matrix transpose()
        Get the transpose of the matrix. This will return a new matrix object that is the transpose.
        Returns:
        a Matrix object that is the transpose of this matrix.

        Returns:

        Returns the result of postmultiplying this by m.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this*m

      • multiply

        public Matrix multiply(double d)
        Returns the result of postmultiplying this by a scalar.
        Parameters:
        d - the scalar with which we will multiply this matrix
        Returns:
        this*d

      • multiply

        public Vector multiply(Vector v)
        Returns the result of multiplying this by the vector v.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • preMultiply

        public Vector preMultiply(Vector v)
        Returns the (row) vector result of premultiplying this by the vector v.
        Parameters:
        v - the row vector to premultiply by
        Returns:
        v*this
